extensionDescription: A cross-browser extension that encompasses the necessary features to best protect individuals against common cyber security risks whilst surfing the web.

featureList.name: Clickjacking Protection
featureList.description: The extension can detect and highlight hidden inline frame features in a URL and Web Page.

featureList.name: Cookie File Protection
featureList.description: The extension can manage and delete appropriate cookie files in a URL and Web Page.

featureList.name: Cross-Site Scripting
featureList.description: The extension can recognize and remove Cross-Site Scripting tags in a URL and Web Page.

featureList.name: Password Suggestion
featureList.description: Users receive a prompt for a more secure and memorable password when visiting sign up pages

featureList.name: Safe Website Checking
featureList.description: The extension can recognize when a site is safe or not using the HTTP protocol and comparing URLs to datasets of websites known to be dangerous, cautioning the user appropriately.

featureList.name: Tracking Protection
featureList.description: The extension can recognize and remove tracking components in a URL and Web Page.

featureList.name: Advertisement Blocking
featureList.description: The extension can recognize and remove advertisement elements on a web page.
